section.title: Disable Remote Shell (rsh)
section.para:
Disables rsh, which is one of the r-commands (rexec, rlogin, rsh) that use unencrypted protocols and are subject to network sniffing and hijacking. Additionally, they have a number of well known weaknesses in their authentication scheme.
rexec
rlogin
rsh

It is recommended to always disable rsh. SSH was designed to be a drop-in replacement for these protocols.
rsh
